title.narrative: Emergency Response to Ebola outbreak in Sierra Leone

description.narrative: • To increase public awareness of EVD in order to reduce the factors for its transmission in Freetown and Koinadugu. • To support MoHS and the District Health Management Teams (DHMT) with sensitisation, early case detection and referral system, as well as with material for infection control (e.g. gloves, aprons, rubber boots, face masks). • To support MoW at district level with the national Ebola response plan in the identified gaps focused in WASH related activities, facilities and consumables like chlorine at community level as well as for the isolation centres in Freetown, Lakka and Kerry Town and temporary holding centre Koinadugu.

participating-org.narrative: UN United Nations Children's Fund UNICEF

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY
